Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.rule

Annotation Interface Signal

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) @Repeatable(Signals.class) public @interface Signal
This annotation is necessary to set up the conditions of a rule with a target specified by the Effect. It binds a condition to the annotated field and supplies an identifier which can be referenced by other annotations.
Author:
Marc Bux, KNIME GmbH, Berlin, Germany

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    Class<? extends Condition>
    condition
     

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Class<?>
    id
     

  • Element Details

    • condition

      Class<? extends Condition> condition
      Returns:
      a condition on the value of the annotated field.

    • id

      Class<?> id
      Returns:
      an id which can be referenced by other annotations (in particular by Effect). It is optional as it is possible to reference the condition directly, but this should only be used when the condition is a custom and unique one in the present settings context.
      Default:
      java.lang.Class.class
